Kevin Vu

Developer & Student

Hi, I'm a guy from Houston who enjoys creating. Check me out below.

I'm Kevin.

I'm a full-stack developer who started my journey when I built my first eCommerce store in high-school, selling techwear clothing at an affordable price. I enjoy development as it gives me the ability to build and create things that others can experience, reflected in my joy for making music. I love working on coding and music projects (I suck at finishing tracks), playing video games, and watching movies or shows.
